trigger.match: ^Locking [hH](?:is|er) eyes with yours\, ([A-Z][a-z]+) clicks [hH](?:is|er) tongue against the roof of [hH](?:is|er) mouth\. As the rhythm of the clicks slows down\, reality seems to stop and start in sudden jerks\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_aeon__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) languidly gestures at you and the world tilts as time itself warps\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_timewarp__

trigger.match: ^You have a sudden sense of deja vu\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_temporalbonds__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) thrusts [hH](?:is|er) palm towards you\, and you feel the air sizzle around you\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_timeechoes__

trigger.match: ^You suddenly relive events that happened just moments ago\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_timeechoes_symp__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gazes deep into your eyes\, revealing oracular visions of the darkest possible of futures\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_oracle__

trigger.match: ^You are haunted by the oracular visions of dark possible futures\, which fill you with fear and dread\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_oracle_symp__

trigger.match: ^The white sphere that surrounds ([A-Z][a-z]+) pulses\, emitting a high\-pitched screech and flashing a series of bright lights\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_aeonfield__

trigger.match: ^The cloying presence of ([A-Z][a-z]+)\'s aeon field envelops you\, causing the air around you to shimmer\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_aeonfield_hit__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) gestures sharply\, then pushes you into a shimmering rift\. You find yourself frozen and can only look helplessly about you\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_displacement__

trigger.match: ^You are trapped in time and can only helplessly watch the world pass you by\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_displaced__

trigger.match: ^([A-Z][a-z]+) punches ([hH](?:is|er)) fist in the air\, and an explosion of light and sound resounds around [hH](?:im|er)\. Holding streams of wavering bands of energy in \2 hand\, \1 whips them back and forth\, sending shockwaves reverbating through the air\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_timequake__

trigger.match: ^Reality wavers and bucks as the world around you stops and starts erratically\. You relive competing\,? possible futures over and over\, which finally calms and leaves you gasping for breath\.$
trigger.name: aeonics_timequake_hit__
